subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Dylan McIlrath, a 6-foot-5 defenseman with flying fists and a heavy shot, is learning about the N.H.L. game whether he is on the ice or on the bench.
snippet: Dylan McIlrath, a 6-foot-5 defenseman with flying fists and a heavy shot, is learning about the N.H.L. game whether he is on the ice or on the bench.
